thread.title: CafePress to Report First Quarter 2018 Results and Host Quarterly Conference Call on May 3

author: cnbc.com
title: CafePress to Report First Quarter 2018 Results and Host Quarterly Conference Call on May 3
text:
LOUISVILLE, Ky., April 12, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- CafePress Inc. (NASDAQ:PRSS) today announced it will report its first quarter 2018 financial results for the period ended March 31, 2018 following the close of market on Wednesday, May 2, 2018. Management will hold a related conference call and webcast on Thursday, May 3, 2018 at 9:00 a.m. Eastern Time / 6:00 a.m. Pacific Time to review and discuss the Company's results.
What: CafePress First Quarter 2018 Financial Results Conference Call When: Thursday, May 3, 2018 Time: 9:00 a.m. Eastern Time / 6:00 a.m. Pacific Time Live Call: (877) 545-1407 or (719) 457-2604 Webcast: http://investor.cafepress.com An archived webcast of the conference call will be accessible from the Investor Relations section of the company's website, http://investor.cafepress.com . A telephonic replay of the conference call will be available until Thursday, May 10, 2018 by dialing (888) 203-1112 and entering passcode 5909124#.
About CafePress [PRSS]:
At CafePress, our mission is to create human connection by inspiring people to express themselves. We believe a coffee mug can start a conversation and a t-shirt can ignite a movement.
Founded in 1999 and based in Louisville, Kentucky, CafePress is the recognized pioneer of customizable products. Our global online platform enables people to express themselves through engaging community generated designs and licensed and personalized one-of-a-kind products.
Investor Relations:
Phil Milliner, CFO
CafePress, Inc.
502-822-7503
pmilliner@cafepress.com
Source:CafePress Inc.
